keyword: how many calories in tomato ketchup
title: How Many Calories in Tomato Ketchup?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in tomato ketchup per tablespoon, including carbs, sugars, sodium, full nutrition breakdown, and serving tips.
h1: How Many Calories in Tomato Ketchup?
assumptions: Standard tomato ketchup (e.g., Heinz-style), per 1 tablespoon (17 g serving); no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, sugar content, and serving size. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of tomato ketchup contains about 20 kcal, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with product packaging.

tweaks.label: Organic or no-salt-added version per tbsp
Add 1 tsp mustard mixed in per tbsp

faqs.q: How many calories in one tablespoon of tomato ketchup?
Is tomato ketchup high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 4.2 g of sugars per tablespoon, mainly from added sugars.

faqs.q: What about sodium in tomato ketchup?
faqs.a: Around 192 mg per tablespoon, so watch portions if on a low-sodium diet.

faqs.q: Calories in tomato ketchup per 100 g?
faqs.a: Roughly 112 kcal per 100 g; scale up from the tablespoon serving.

faqs.q: Does brand affect calories in tomato ketchup?
faqs.a: Yes, variations range from 15â€“25 kcal per tbsp depending on recipe and sugar content.
